name: HedgeCo Securities
tag_list: hedge-funds, emerging-managers, established-managers, investors, securities, prime-brokerage, third-party-marketing, capital-introduction, managers, marketing, capital, funds, trade-execution
overview:
HedgeCo Securities specializes in prime broker introduction and capital introduction. With a hands-on-approach, the best practices are used to assist clients in the strategic development, management, and expansion of their business. They offer introduction of hedge fund managers to prime brokers that can offer prime services, trading & execution, and valuable industry relationships. HedgeCo can provide hedge fund managers and investors with a comprehensive and effective spectrum of service through start-up introduction, website creation, online client report materials creation, database of hedge funds and online portal. With a particular execution strategy built into strategic partnerships and long-standing relationships with established prime brokers, HedgeCo Securities can make introductions to:

-Trade execution, secured lending, clearance, and custody -Real-time portfolio reporting, vigilant compliance, and risk management -Prestige leverage of new business and negotiate favorable items -Cost-efficient execution of alternative trading strategies

Hedge funds of any size are welcome for assistance including managers developing a business plan prior to launch to mature funds with sophisticated needs.
